alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 1:01PM MST until August 13 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 101 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brenda, or 38 miles southeast of Parker, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brenda. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 31 and 45. US Highway 60 between mile markers 31 and 45. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 42 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
